description: Enjoy the freedom of wireless connectivity with the long range V7 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo.  This 2.4 GHz multimedia keyboard and optical mouse w/ nano receiver allows you to work up to 20 feet from your computer. It is designed to eliminate the clutter of wires for great convenience. This sleek keyboard, with its space saving layout, enhances desk space. 8 one-touch keys make it easy to control multimedia and frequently used keys. Quick and simple to set up, your keyboard and mouse will perform as reliably as any corded product.  A 1000-dpi optical mouse responds instantly, tracks precisely, and provides maximum wireless freedom.  You'll love the combination of quality, comfort, convenience, and style.
title: V7 Elite Wireless Desktop Keyboard Mouse Combo (CK2P0-7N6P)
